item.title: FANTASIAN Neo Dimension demo now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/fantasian-neo-dimension-demo-now-available

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Experience the first few hours of the story.

Publisher Square Enix and developer Mistwalker have released a free demo for turn-based RPG FANTASIAN Neo Dimension across for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam, the companies announced. A demo for the PlayStation 4 version is not available.

The demo allows players to experience the first few hours of the game, including the multi-dimensional battle mechanics, while beginning to solve the strange mystery of the world and protagonist Leo’s lost memories. Save data from the demo can be carried over to the full game.

FANTASIAN Neo Dimension launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 5.

Watch a new trailer below.

Accolades Trailer

item.title: MultiVersus adds Adventure Time’s Marceline on December 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/multiversus-adds-adventure-times-marceline-on-december-17

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

New character to debut alongside "Candy Kingdom" map.

Free-to-play platform fighting game MultiVersus will add em>Adventure Time‘s Marceline on December 17 alongside the new “Candy Kingdom” map, publisher Warner Bros. Games and developer Player First Games announced.

Get the details below.

New Playable Character: Marceline

Armed with her trusty bass guitar axe, Marceline is a Bruiser class fighter who will shred through any challenge that comes her way. In the new trailer, Marceline’s combo-heavy moveset is on full display, including her unique talent to leverage the power of rhythm to amplify attacks and ability to morph into a vampire bat to bash, grab, and elbow opponents. The video also provides a first look at the Sun Hat Marceline and Distant Lands Marceline character variants. For information on how to access the Marceline playable character and other Season 4 in-game content, visit our FAQ.

New Map: Candy Kingdom

Additionally, the new “Candy Kingdom” map based on the iconic locale from the Adventure Time series will arrive on December 17 alongside Marceline’s release, followed by the debut of Rogue Rifts, a new twist on Rifts mode where players must complete a gauntlet of five nodes with a limited number of daily attempts. The first Rogue Rift will be available from January 14, 2025 to February 4, 2025, and players will have the chance to earn the Abominable Mountaineer Jason character variant upon each completion of the challenge.

MultiVersus is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Marceline “The Vampire Queen” Gameplay Trailer
